text:
Release date
July 2024
Question asked
Is it allowed to use OEKOBAUDAT data after EN 15804 to report GHG emissions within the ESRS?
Within ESRS, the Commission Recommendation (EU) 2021/2279 is allowed to use and indicate
the use of Environmental Footprint EF v3.1 impact categories. On the JRC website, it seems as if
EF v.3.1 impact categories and EN 15804 impact categories are harmonised. Does this mean that
these two impact categories (EF V3.1 and OEKOBAUDAT) can be used? Can they be summed up
